job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pBlackstone Talent Group an awardwinning technology consulting and talent agency is seeking a Senior Site Reliability Engineer SRE to join our client in a 100 remote opportunityppbrppLooking for AWS or GCP experience and a background in backend development Some of the opportunity highlightsppbrpp Worldwide market leaderpp Will be building out and supporting new product linespp 100 Remotepp Full time permanentdirect hire opportunityppbrppSr SRE will be building out amp supporting new product lines that collect analyticsdata from retail locations across the globeppbrppIdeal Candidate will have the followingpulli5 years SRE experienceliliStrong Backend dev experienceliliStrong AWS or GCP experience  liliExperience with KanbanliliPython GO or Terraform experienceliulpbrppWork in an environment where you can focus on big problems Low on meetings and overhead We are a community of makers and we want people with the same mindset Focused on building great solutions to the problems our customers facep
